about_the_game:
Embark on a journey through time and strategy in Iterum, the real-time strategy game where your decisions shape the destiny of civilizations. Challenge yourself to master the delicate balance of food production, happiness, and taxation to forge a thriving society.

Secure your people’s future by constructing essential improvements like the Granary, Hunter’s Cottage, Mill, and Docks. Each decision impacts your settlement’s growth, from the rationing of food to the levying of taxes—choices that will determine the happiness and expansion of your population.



Dive into the rich layers of gameplay with prospection, mining, and metal smelting. Utilize these resources wisely to bolster happiness, increase wealth, and upgrade your military might.

With a diverse array of metals at your disposal, strategic resource management becomes the key to advancing your civilization’s technology and power.



In Iterum, diplomacy and warfare go hand in hand.
Command an array of military units—infantry, archers, cavalry, and siege engines—to defend your lands or expand your empire.
Form formidable armies, engage in tactical battles, lay siege to enemy settlements, or occupy strategic territories to weaken your foes before striking.



But the saga of Rome is not just written in the ink of diplomats or the blood of soldiers; it is also etched by the changing of seasons and the realism of survival.

Manage your armies’ rations to keep them fed on long campaigns, establish supply posts to sustain them through the harsh winters, and fortify zones to repel invasions. The elements themselves become adversaries, as winter’s chill can sap the strength of the unprepared, making the establishment of supply lines not just a matter of logistics, but of survival.



Incorporate sanitation into your strategy to prevent disease from decimating your populace.

Construct Wells, Bathhouses, and Apothecaries to ensure the health and morale of your citizens, for a healthy city is a strong city.



In Iterum, every element of governance is a thread in the tapestry of your legacy—will yours be a tale of triumph over adversity, or a cautionary story of neglect? The choice is yours. Forge your destiny and let the echoes of your triumphs resound through time.

Map editor

Can't get enough of the scenarios? Why not build your own?
In the map editor you can edit the terrain, paint the map in different biomes, place settlements and pick the winning conditions.
